Title: Realized Variance Calculation

column5: annualized using 252 trading days convention for equity markets. **Mathematical Foundation**: Realized variance œÉ_realized¬≤ = (252/N) ‚àë [ln(S_{t_i}/S_{t_{i-1}})]¬≤ approximates the quadratic variation ‚à´ œÉ_t¬≤ dt. The 252 factor annualizes the daily variance. **Key Assumptions**: Continuous trading
column6: no microstructure noise
column7: log-price follows diffusion. **Practical Applications**: Volatility measurement
column10: market microstructure analysis. **Limitations**: Market microstructure noise; discrete sampling bias. **Implementation**: High-frequency data processing; noise-robust estimators for practical use. **Related Concepts**: Realized volatility (square root); bipower variation for jump-robust estimation.

Title: Year-on-Year Inflation Swap Payoff
Notes: Inflation swap exchanging a fixed rate K for the realized year-on-year inflation rate
column5: providing exposure to inflation expectations. **Mathematical Foundation**: The payoff N √ó (I_T/I_{T-1} - 1 - K) where I_T is inflation index at maturity T
column6: I_{T-1} at T-1 years. This gives exposure to one-year inflation rate ending at T. **Key Assumptions**: Deterministic inflation indices
column10: monetary policy analysis. **Limitations**: Index revision risk; seasonal adjustment issues. **Implementation**: Inflation curve bootstrapping; analytical or Monte Carlo pricing. **Related Concepts**: Zero-coupon inflation swaps; inflation caps/floors.

Title: Zero-Coupon Inflation Swap Payoff
Notes: Zero-coupon inflation swap providing exposure to cumulative inflation over the entire term
column5: with single payoff at maturity. **Mathematical Foundation**: The payoff N √ó (I_T/I_0 - (1 + K)^T) compares realized cumulative inflation I_T/I_0 against fixed growth (1+K)^T. This is equivalent to a zero-coupon bond with inflation adjustment. **Key Assumptions**: Deterministic inflation indices
column6: no counterparty risk
column7: standard payoff structure. **Practical Applications**: Long-term inflation hedging
column9: inflation-linked structured products. **Limitations**: Long horizon uncertainty; index calculation methodology risk. **Implementation**: Inflation curve bootstrapping; requires long-term inflation expectations. **Related Concepts**: Year-on-year swaps; inflation-linked bonds.
